summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Relasi4Warna Phase 2 features including expanded questions, admin CMS, share functionality, PWA support, and mobile responsiveness. Most features working correctly with minor issues identified.

minor_issues.issue: Business and couples series have 23 questions instead of 24
minor_issues.impact: Medium - requirement was 24 questions per series

ui_bugs.issue: Language toggle button clicks but content doesn't visibly change to English

passed_tests: Landing page loads correctly on mobile viewport (390x844)
PWA manifest.json is accessible with correct configuration
Family and friendship series have 24 questions each
Share card endpoint /api/share/card/{result_id} returns proper 404 for invalid IDs
Admin login with credentials admin@relasi4warna.com works successfully
Admin stats endpoint /api/admin/stats returns data
Admin questions endpoint /api/admin/questions works
Admin coupons endpoint /api/admin/coupons works
Admin users endpoint /api/admin/users works
Admin results endpoint /api/admin/results works
PDF report endpoint /api/report/pdf/{result_id} returns proper 404 for invalid IDs
Share data endpoint /api/share/data/{result_id} works
PWA manifest contains proper app name, short name, and standalone display mode
Service Worker API is available in browser
Mobile navigation from landing page to series selection works
Series selection page displays correctly with all 4 series
Backend API health endpoints working
User registration and login flows working
Quiz flow endpoints working
Payment endpoints working
All archetype data accessible
action_item_for_main_agent: 1. Add one more question to business and couples series to reach 24 questions each. 2. Fix language toggle functionality to properly switch content between Indonesian and English. 3. Ensure admin CMS page is accessible after login without requiring re-authentication.
